attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006- 0044

Specifically the proposed increase for adoption paperwork.

The costs for the forms for adoption are already very high. They are not too
high to pay once, but the fact of the matter is that many of us who are adopting
to pay for them twice because the entire adoption process takes so long. This
is ridiculous.

The entire process needs to be evaluated and streamlined. I'm sure it costs a
lot to do everything the way it is done now, but it needn't cost so much because
so much of the work is done more than once.

Until the whole process is reconsidered, it is unconscionable to raise the prices.

Sincerely,
Elin Melchior
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Elin Melchior
